title: Im looking for a support (silver) to duo - Im silver 4
body:
i main {{champion:222}}  and i could also play {{champion:81}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:104}} 

Send me a friend request if you want to duo with me

replies.body: I ll join man i mian lenoa sup,  or zilean or blitz i know im bronze but believe me man ive just been so unlucky give me one game as a trial and ill show u what i got if ur intrested to duo together
added you on client. message me and we can talk
